name: Meklord Astro Genesis
text: Can be used if you have Special Summoned 3 or more "Meklord Emperor" monsters. Banish 1 "Meklord Emperor Wisel", 1 "Meklord Emperor Skiel", and 1 "Meklord Emperor Granel" from your Graveyard and play 1 "Meklord Astro Mekanikle" from your Deck or hand in Attack Position. This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck that contains no monsters other than "Meklord" monsters. (Extra Deck does not count.) This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
